Class DoorState

java.lang.Object
engine.level.door.DoorState
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoorStateClosed, DoorStateClosing, DoorStateHide, DoorStateOpen, DoorStateOpening
public abstract class DoorState extends Object
Clase que representa el estado de la puerta (patron state)
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri
